page.title: 09BRICKYARD FARM,WEDMORE
page.content: {TYPE OF FARM}BEEF AND SHEEP FARM {OCCUPANTS}MR AND MRS SELWAY SNR,MR SELWAY {ANIMALS }1 FRIESIAN COW,30 HEREFORD BULLOCKS, 1 SUFFOLK RAM,28 SUFFOLK EWES, 20 LAMBS, 20 HENS, 5 CHICKS{ {PRODUCE} MILK,EGGS,MEAT,WOOL,20 ACRES GRASS FOR GRAZING,40 ACRES GRASS FOR HAY { {WORKERS} 1 FULL TIME,4 PART TIME {BUILDINGS} 1 CATTLE CUBICLE HOUSE, DUTCH BARN,2 LAMBING HOUSES {MACHINERY}2 DAVID BROWN TRACTORS,1 INTERNATIONAL TRACTOR,BAILER,ROTOVATOR TURNER,TEDDER,2 TRAILERS, MUCK SPREADER {BUYING AND SELLING}12 CALVES,MILK POWDER,COWCAKE BOUGHT,BEEF,LAMB, 6 BULLOCKS,20 LAMBS SOLD {PESTS}WORMS IN SHEEP{ { { }
